name: Bash + Debris
description:
The Galacdorks are invading Earth to destroy and conquer. Time to fight fire with fire! Play as Bash or Debris to rid the world of an alien invasion by smashing your way through the enemies. Destroy your enemies to save your planet!

Bash + Debris is a side-scrolling action game with a very clear objective, destroy. The game play is simple and engaging for all players with different unique environments, play styles and enemies to encounter. With each new environment, there are also different physics involved which makes game play more exciting and engaging. 

Credit goes to the students of Spring Roll Studios and the help of Limbitless!

Spring Roll Studios is a team of UCF students making games for Limbitless Solutions. They revised and added onto a previous build of Bash + Debris with two new levels for more game play and play-ability. Game play also features controllers for the Limbitless support system that allows children with handicaps and missing limbs the opportunity to play games. Thank you for trying out Bash + Debris!
